convert_trades_economy.description: Determines when the mob transforms, if the trades should be converted when the new mob has a economy_trade_table. When the trades are converted, the mob will generate a new trade list with their new trade table, but then it will try to convert any of the same trades over to have the same enchantments and user data. For example, if the original has a Emerald to Enchanted Iron Sword (Sharpness 1), and the new trade also has an Emerald for Enchanted Iron Sword, then the enchantment will be Sharpness 1.
convert_trades_economy.title: Convert Trades Economy

BCE.title: Genetics 1.8.0
BCE.description: Defines the way a mob's genes and alleles are passed on to it's offspring, and how those traits manifest in the child. Compatible parent genes are crossed together, the alleles are handed down from the parents to the child, and any matching genetic variants fire off JSON events to modify the child and express the traits.

genetic_variants.description: The list of genetic variants for this gene. These check for particular allele combinations and fire events when all of them are satisfied.
genetic_variants.title: Genetic Variants

items.title: Genetic Variants
items.description: The genetic variant for this gene. These check for particular allele combinations and fire events when all of them are satisfied.

both_allele.description: If this value is non-negative, compare both the mob's main and hidden alleles with this value for a match with both. Can also be a range of integers.
both_allele.title: Both Allele

either_allele.description: If this value is non-negative, compare both the mob's main and hidden alleles with this value for a match with either. Can also be a range of integers.

main_allele.description: If this value is non-negative, compare the mob's main allele with this value for a match. Can also be a range of integers.

When the trades are converted, the mob will generate a new trade list with their new trade table, but then it will try to convert any of the same trades over to have the same enchantments and user data. For example, if the original has a Emerald to Enchanted Iron Sword (Sharpness 1), and the new trade also has an Emerald for Enchanted Iron Sword, then the enchantment will be Sharpness 1.

variant.description: The percentage chance of a mutation on the entity's variant type.

must_see.description: If true, only entities in this mob's viewing range can be selected as targets
must_see.title: Must See

must_see_forget_duration.description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more
must_see_forget_duration.title: Must See Forget Duration

persist_time.description: Time in seconds for a valid target to stay targeted when it becomes and invalid target.
persist_time.title: Persist Time

reselect_targets.description: If true, the target will change to the current closest entity whenever a different entity is closer
reselect_targets.title: Reselect Targets

scan_interval.description: How many ticks to wait between scanning for a target.
scan_interval.title: Scan Interval

set_persistent.description: Allows the actor to be set to persist upon targeting a player
set_persistent.title: Set Persistent

target_search_height.description: Height in blocks to search for a target mob. -1.0f means the height does not matter.
target_search_height.title: Target Search Height

within_radius.description: Distance in blocks that the target can be within to launch an attack
within_radius.title: Within Radius

FEH.description: Allows the mob to be tempted by food they like.
FEH.title: Tempt 1.16.0

goal_radius.description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the `wiggle room` to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot
goal_radius.title: Goal Radius

search_height.description: Height in blocks from the owner the pet can be to sleep with owner.
search_height.title: Search Height

search_range.description: The distance in blocks from the owner the pet can be to sleep with owner.
search_range.title: Search Range

FEI.description: Allows the mob to pick up items on the ground.
FEI.title: Pickup Items 1.16.0

can_pickup_any_item.description: If true, the mob can pickup any item
can_pickup_any_item.title: Can Pickup Any Item

can_pickup_to_hand_or_equipment.description: If true, the mob can pickup items to its hand or armor slots
can_pickup_to_hand_or_equipment.title: Can Pickup To Hand Or Equipment

goal_radius.description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the `wiggle room` to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot
goal_radius.title: Goal Radius

max_dist.description: Maximum distance this mob will look for items to pick up
max_dist.title: Maximum Dist

pickup_based_on_chance.description: If true, depending on the difficulty, there is a random chance that the mob may not be able to pickup items
pickup_based_on_chance.title: Pickup Based On Chance

track_target.description: If true, this mob will chase after the target as long as it's a valid target
track_target.title: Track Target

FEJ.description: Allows a mob to randomly fly around
FEJ.title: Random Fly 1.16.0

avoid_damage_blocks.description: UNDOCUMENTED
avoid_damage_blocks.title: Avoid Damage Blocks

can_land_on_trees.description: If true, the mob can stop flying and land on a tree instead of the ground
can_land_on_trees.title: Can Land On Trees

xz_dist.description: Distance in blocks on ground that the mob will look for a new spot to move to. Must be at least 1
xz_dist.title: Xz Dist

y_dist.description: Distance in blocks that the mob will look up or down for a new spot to move to. Must be at least 1
y_dist.title: Y Dist

FFA.description: Allows the mob to randomly sit and look around for a duration. Note: Must have a sitting animation set up to use this.
FFA.title: Random Look Around And Sit 1.16.0

max_look_count.description: The Maximum amount of unique looks a mob will have while looking around.
max_look_count.title: Maximum Look Count

max_look_time.description: The Maximum amount of time (in ticks) a mob will stay looking at a direction while looking around.
max_look_time.title: Maximum Look Time

min_look_count.description: The Minimum amount of unique looks a mob will have while looking around.
min_look_count.title: Minimum Look Count

min_look_time.description: The Minimum amount of time (in ticks) a mob will stay looking at a direction while looking around.
min_look_time.title: Minimum Look Time

probability.description: The probability of randomly looking around/sitting.
probability.title: Probability

FFB.description: Allows the mob to stay at a certain level when in liquid.
FFB.title: Rise To Liquid Level 1.16.0

delay.description: Amount of time in seconds before starting this step

event.description: The event to send to the entity

sound_event.description: The sound event to play when this step happens

FFC.description: Allows the mob to send an event to another mob.
FFC.title: Send Event 1.16.0

cast_duration.description: Time in seconds for the entire event sending process
cast_duration.title: Cast Duration

FFD.description: Allows the mob to stay at a certain level when in liquid.
FFD.title: Stroll Towards Village 1.16.0

cooldown_time.description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again
cooldown_time.title: Cooldown Time

goal_radius.description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the `wiggle room` to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot
goal_radius.title: Goal Radius

search_range.description: The distance in blocks to search for points inside villages. If <= 0, find the closest village regardless of distance.
search_range.title: Search Range

speed_multiplier.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
speed_multiplier.title: Speed Multiplier

start_chance.description: This is the chance that the mob will start this goal, from 0 to 1
start_chance.title: Start Chance

FFE.description: Allows the mob to be tempted by food they like.
FFE.title: Tempt 1.16.0

can_get_scared.description: If true, the mob can stop being tempted if the player moves too fast while close to this mob
can_get_scared.title: Can Get Scared

items.description: List of items this mob is tempted by
items.title: Items

within_radius.description: Distance in blocks this mob can get tempted by a player holding an item they like
within_radius.title: Within Radius
